subtitle: "Based on Team Roster Metrics"

format: pdf
editor: visual
---

```{r}
#| label: load-packages
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(cowplot)
```

```{r}
#| label: load-data
#| message: false
#| warning: false

data <- read_csv("Duke Roster and Performance Data.csv")

data <- data |>
  mutate(coachElko = if_else(Coach == "Elko", TRUE, FALSE))
```

```{r}
data |>
  ggplot(
    aes(x = class_score, y = overallPct, color = coachElko)
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
